scripts.?build: echo Compile typescript sources to JS files and typescript definitions.
scripts.?test: echo Run unit tests on compiled files.
scripts.?dev: echo Use dev.ts to work on your lib before it's testable.
scripts.dev: npm run build --silent quick-compile && tsc tests/dev.ts && node tests/dev.js
scripts.?check: echo Clean, build and run tests.
scripts.check: npm run clean --silent && npm run build --silent && npm run test --silent
scripts.?compress: echo Compress compiled code with Terser as a production release, then show compressed bundle size.
scripts.?clean: echo Remove all generated files like compiled JS files and typescript definitions.
scripts.?reinstall: echo Remove and re-install all node modules.
scripts.?increment: echo Increment package.json version with semver argument (major|minor|patch). Default is patch.
scripts.?release:
echo Publish new version on Git / NPM and update documentation.
Usage : npm run release (patch|minor|major) "commit message"
scripts.?wip: echo Push a work in progress to Git. Nothing will be tested or published.
